title: Hearty lentil loaf
ingredients: ['275g (10 oz) green lentils', '1 medium onion, quartered', '2 carrots, quartered', '1 red pepper, quartered', '4 tablespoons wheatgerm', '100g (4 oz) cooked brown rice', '75g (3 oz) breadcrumbs', '4 tablespoons crushed flax seed', '175ml (6 fl oz) egg whites', '175g (6 oz) passata', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', 'pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', 'salt to taste']
